channel.title: Is it a good idea?
channel.description: Is it a good idea to return to this game? I've quit it since 2011, I don't know, is it a good idea anyway? I've nothing to do so..

item.title: Is it a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

casey.:

RS is pretty much Gamble and Bot scape nowadays.

So not true.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @iEclipse iEclipse
item.description:
@iEclipse wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:18, topic:451372”][quote author=iEclipse link=topic=554263.msg4061549#msg4061549 date=1343476284]

Combat is going to be more interactive and skilling in a sense will be easier due to the functions of the action bar. There really is no downside to it at all besides the fact that its a change and people hate change.

Yeah they do, beside I feel RS is too easy, that new area for runecrafting, man it’s too easy to get 99 RC!
[/quote]But would you rather run like crazy for hours to make some crappy 100k exp for a whole day?

First people were complaining that the game requires too much grinding, now some complain that it is too easy.[/quote]

Hmm, but anyways people will get over it …

Read full topic

item.title: Is it a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @iEclipse iEclipse
item.description:
@iEclipse wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:13, topic:451372”][quote author=iEclipse link=topic=554263.msg4060699#msg4060699 date=1343397794]

Are you aware of the combat beta btw?

Nope, I hate it! gosh will it be replaced with the actual combat system?
[/quote]

So you haven’t heard of it, but you hate it? Give Jagex a chance.[/quote]

When I saw the reply, I searched a little bit about it, and saw some footage.

If you enjoyed it then you'll enjoy it now. The EoC still is a few months away from release so you wont have to worry about that (no reason to be worried seeing as you haven't even tried it yet), and SoF/Solomon's store isn't as bad as people make it out to be.

Hmm, but… I don’t know it will be better if there won’t be these kind of stuff :s.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @iEclipse iEclipse
item.description:
@iEclipse wrote:

Loveandpower:

I say go for it. Everyone needs a break off and on.

Yeah I agree, thanks man!

Frell:

If you didnt quit until 2011 then nothing has changed majorly.

Woah great! thanks for telling me.

At last I decided to get back, moderators, you can lock this thread.

item.title: Is it a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @iEclipse iEclipse
item.description:
@iEclipse wrote:

Frell:

Yes. Pretty much people can pay to pretty much update every animation their character does in the game (and clothing), rather than giving them to everyone and improving runescape overall quality.

Too bad they care about money, anyways I’m going to purchase RS membership today.
Still I need people to reply.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @iEclipse iEclipse
item.description:
@iEclipse wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:2, topic:451372”]Depends. Game feels like a huge gimmick now with two optional paying services ONTOP of members.

Only thing thats changed is members no longer guarantees access to all content.[/quote]

Do you mean the fortune and rune-coin things?

Read full topic
